column1: #Text=Ozai says : " After generations of Fire Lords failed to find you , now the universe delivers you to me as an act of providence . "
#Text=I have all the power in the world !
#Text=" Suki says : " Should n't we be helping him ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " The Fire Lord is Aang 's fight .
#Text=We need to stay focused on stopping that fleet from burning down the Earth Kingdom .
#Text=" Toph says : " And how do we do that , Captain Boomerang ?
#Text=I ca n't see outside of this floating hunk of metal .
